lead_paragraph: If Gov. Charlie Crist of Florida does manage to defy political gravity, the scolding from the Republican and Democratic leaders will surely fade away.
snippet: If Gov. Charlie Crist of Florida does manage to defy political gravity, the scolding from the Republican and Democratic leaders will surely fade away.

headline.main: Parties Snipe at Crist, but May Court Him Later
headline.seo: Sniping at Crist Begins, but Wait for November
headline.print_headline: In Florida, Testing the Fate of the Party-Switcher
